main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @vchFullSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[View_LoanStaticMainSecurity]'')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[View_LoanStaticMainSecurity] ' exec(@vchSQL) set @vchSQL = ' CREATE VIEW [dbo].[View_LoanStaticMainSecurity] AS Select FCL.DimLoanID, FCMS.DimSecurityID, FCL.DimConsolidationID, FCL.LTVPassNo, FCL.DimPoolID From dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL (nolock) inner join ( Select DimConsolidationID , DimPoolID , DimSecurityID , LTVPassNo From ( Select FCS.DimConsolidationID , FCS.DimPoolID , FS.DimSecurityID , LTVPassNo , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY FCS.DimConsolidationID, FCS.DimPoolID, LTVPassNo ORDER BY FS.SecurityValuationAmt DESC, FS.SecurityNo DESC ) AS SecurityRanking From dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity FCS (nolock) Inner Join dbo.tblFactSecurity FS (nolock) on FS.DimPoolID = FCS.DimPoolID and FS.DimSecurityID = FCS.DimSecurityId Inner Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS (nolock) on FS.DimPoolID = DS.DimPoolID and FS.DimSecurityID = DS.DimSecurityId and DS.StaticSecurityFlag = ''''Y'''' ) As ConsolidationSecurityRanking Where SecurityRanking = 1 ) FCMS on FCL.DimPoolID = FCMS.DimPoolID and FCL.DimConsolidationID = FCMS.DimConsolidationID And FCL.LTVPassNo = FCMS.LTVPassNo '
SET @vchFullSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @vchFullSQL EXEC (@vchFullSQL)
